short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights selected letters or letter groups in words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kobi browser extension introduces the Kobification method to the Web. This method improves readability and makes decoding easier by segmenting words and colouring selected letters. It is intended for children with reading difficulties providing support during the learning process.
